column2: Rapid and difficult respiration, 2 tumor sites (on top of head and right shoulder); tumor invaded the right eye completely--probably blinded; tumor on shoulder was fluid filled and on top of head was solid.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Skull had a small hole -- possible it wasn't a met and a direct extension from brain.
Brain looked slightly bloody upon visual inspection. H&L looked enlarged.
1 tumor chunk frozen and no cell line attempted.
